about:
Hi, my name is **Septian Nuriyanto**. I'm a Software Engineer and a graduated Computer Science Student, and an eternal learner.

I built apps since 2022, and everything I built is based of my passion and high standard about my work. I love to learn new things to improve my skill, in order to deliver the best satisfaction for my clients.

My skillsets cover wide range of products, but are not limited to Front End, Back End Development, and especially my strenght in Mobile App Development.
